arts.ttl: The lowdown on Everton 2 Crystal Palace 1 - Meek loss at Goodison Park as attacking play is slow and methodical
arts.sum: After conceding moments into the second half to a Dwight McNeil wonder strike, the former Burnley man struck again seven minutes later and the Eagles offered nothing in response and drifted tamely to defeat. Palace boss Glasner stuck with his trusted 3-4-2-1 formation, with Jefferson Lerma on the left side of the back three.

arts.ttl: McNeil the hero as Everton claim first win of the season
arts.sum: But Sean Dyche ’s side rallied after the break, with McNeil hitting the back of the net with a delightful long-range strike in the 47th minute before adding a second at the far post just seven minutes later as they continued their fine form against Palace at Goodison Park. Dwight McNeil’s double secured Everton ’s first three points of the Premier League season, coming from behind to beat Crystal Palace 2-1 at Goodison Park.

arts.ttl: Everton 2-1 Crystal Palace: Dwight McNeil double sinks winless Eagles in rare comeback
arts.sum: Pressure eases on Sean Dyche but Oliver Glasner will demand a huge improvement as worrying run continues

arts.ttl: Sean Dyche responds to Everton boos after finally earning first Premier League win
arts.sum: Having twice squandered two-goal leads to lose in the last month, Dwight McNeil’s double just after half-time turned things around after Marc Guehi’s 10th-minute opener to secure a win over Crystal Palace

arts.ttl: Sean Dyche hails ‘a step forward’ after Everton end their wait for a win
arts.sum: Dwight McNeil scored twice to see off Crystal Palace.

arts.ttl: What Everton players were told at half time as inspiration for comeback revealed
arts.sum: The Everton manager reacts after the Blues earned their first win of the new Premier League season

arts.ttl: Exeter boss praises Joe Whitworth’s contribution as Crystal Palace loanee keeps clean sheet in Wigan draw
arts.sum: The Eagles youngster made six saves during the game and kept his fourth clean sheet in League One this season. Whitworth, 20, is on his first senior loan spell away from Selhurst Park and has been an ever-present in the Exeter team.

arts.ttl: What Gwladys Street sung after colossal Jarrad Branthwaite moment said all after Everton comeback
arts.sum: Verdict from joe Thomas after Everton's clash with Crystal Palace in the Premier League on Saturday

arts.ttl: Oliver Glasner pinpoints spell where Crystal Palace fell to defeat at Everton
arts.sum: Oliver Glasner says a 15-minute spell at the start of the second half cost his Crystal Palace side as Everton came from a goal down to win 2-1 at Goodison Park on Saturday afternoon. Sean Dyche’s side quickly equalised two minutes into the start of the second half when Dwight McNeil curled a stunning left-footed shot from distance around Dean Henderson after Daichi Kamada lost possession.

arts.ttl: Everton 2-1 Crystal Palace: Highlights, man of the match, stats as McNeil stars
arts.sum: Dwight McNeil inspired Everton to a brilliant 2-1 comeback victory over Crystal Palace on Saturday, securing the Toffees their first three points in the Premier League.
